EmailTemplate.subject: {{Lead.First Name:default=Awesomely}}: VMTurbo Topology Stencils Are Here | for MS Visio & OmniGraffle
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://vmturbo.com/resources/datacenter-stencils/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=stencils&utm_content=050415> {{lead.First Name:default=}}: VMTurbo's FREE downloadable topology stencils <http://vmturbo.com/resources/datacenter-stencils/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=stencils&utm_content=061715> are just our latest way of giving back to the IT community. These HD icons download in both .vssx and .gstencil formats, for use with Microsoft VisioÂ® and OmniGraffle. Clouds, VDCs, Hosts, Arrays, VDI groups: all in dazzling HD. If you'd like a stencil that we haven't designed, simply visit The Green Circle Community <https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/welcome?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=stencils&utm_content=061715> and submit a request! <http://vmturbo.com/resources/datacenter-stencils/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=stencils&utm_content=061715>
- The VMTurbo Team
